title: Preserving Video Games
itunes:title: Preserving Video Games
description:
Why is the preservation of video games such a complicated mess? And what's the big deal with preserving them in the first place? We look at how enthusiasts and historians are trying to find ways to prevent old games from being forgotten.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Why is the preservation of video games such a complicated mess? And what's the big deal with preserving them in the first place? We look at how enthusiasts and historians are trying to find ways to prevent old games from being forgotten.

itunes:keywords: video games, history, preservation, data preservation, data storage, MAME, MESS, ROM, copyright, intellectual property, IP, DRM, digital rights management, MMO, MMORPG, Ubisoft, Assassin's Creed, Always-On DRM
